MISSION_FLOAT_LIQUIDATION_AUDIT.title: Float-to-Int Migration & Test Modernization Audit
MISSION_FLOAT_LIQUIDATION_AUDIT.instruction_raw: Audit residual float usage in SettlementSystem, MatchingEngine, and DTOs. Design a migration plan for TD-CRIT-FLOAT-SETTLE and a corresponding test modernization plan.

spec-matching-engine-int-math.title: SPEC: MatchingEngine Integer Math Hardening
spec-matching-engine-int-math.instruction_raw: Refactor the MatchingEngine math to use integer pennies exclusively. Define rounding rules (Round-Down/Floor) for mid-price discovery to eliminate M2 drift. Ensure execution prices and total values are calculated as integers.

spec-dto-reporting-pennies.title: SPEC: Reporting DTO Penny Hardening
spec-dto-reporting-pennies.instruction_raw: Analyze all DTOs in simulation/dtos/api.py. Identify any fields currently using float for monetary values (assets, price, wealth, indicators) and refactor them to integer pennies (int). Ensure backward compatibility with existing serialization logic where possible.
